# Test Fixtures

Place test resume files here for integration tests.

## Required Files

### English Resumes
- `resume_en.docx` - English resume in DOCX format
- `resume_en.txt` - English resume in TXT format
- `resume_en.md` - English resume in Markdown format

### Russian Resumes
- `resume_ru.docx` - Russian resume in DOCX format
- `resume_ru.txt` - Russian resume in TXT format
- `resume_ru.md` - Russian resume in Markdown format

## Notes

- Files should contain realistic resume data
- Include contact info, experience, skills, education
- Use proper formatting for each file type
- Files are used in integration tests to verify parsing and generation
